title: Thresh not melee or ranged?
body:
So i was messing around in a custom game and i noticed that thresh cannot buy runaans hurricane, reason being the item says Ranged Only. I also thought of how fun it would be if thresh could use ravenous hydra instead if he was changed to a "melee" champ, but found out shortly after buying it (it actually allowed me to buy it, unlike runaans), that the item is greyed out in your inventory slots and it says there, but not in shop Melee Only, and the items passive did not activate nor did its active. 

My guess is that this happened with the recent runaans rework and maybe thresh was not on some list of "ranged champs" or something, i dont know how you all code that, either variable permissions for each champ or arrays of melee and ranged champs is my guess, but im just an amateur programmer. I just thought it was odd that he wasnt concidered ranged or melee.

(As a side note, just think of how fun, if not, funny looking thresh with ravenous/titanic hydra would be.)

replies.body:
Good morning Maw of Kog! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are looking into it.
Never forget, Thresh can auto through Yasuo's Windwalls.

> [{quoted}](name=disasterraptor,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=hvxPl9Yt,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-19T18:31:03.514+0000)
>
> Never forget, Thresh can auto through Yasuo's Windwalls.

So can Vel'Koz, neither one is a projectile. It's intentional (though somewhat odd that it's the case on a midlaner and support).
I did the same exact thing, but in an ARAM. I tried to build runaan, it says ranged only, so I think, ok... they decided to classify him as melee... So I try Face of the Mountain and Hydra... no go
That's definitely a bug then.  He used to be able to buy Hurricane and use it just fine.
